ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We purified their sincerity through sincere remembrance of the Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We distinguished them for the distinct remembrance of the abode (of the Hereafter).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily We exalted them in consideration of a sterling quality: their remembrance of the Abode of the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave them this pure distinction because of their continual remembrance of the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We indeed gave them distinction with a genuine affair – the remembrance of the (everlasting) abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We did choose them by granting them the remembrance of the Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We purified them by a pure quality, the keeping in mind of the (final) abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Assuredly We purified them with a quality most pure, the remembrance of the Abode,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We purified them with a pure thought, remembrance of the Home (of the Hereafter).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We chose them for a special [purpose] -- proclaiming the message of the Hereafter:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We purified them with exclusive remembrance of the abode [of the Hereafter].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We did choose them by granting them (a good thing, i.e.) the remembrance of the home [in the Hereafter and they used to make the people remember it, and also they used to invite the people to obey Allah and to do good deeds for the Hereafter].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We purified them with a most pure quality, the remembrance of the Everlasting Life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:46] Assuredly We purified them with an exclusive [thought], namely, the remembrance of the Abode, of the Hereafter: in other words to [always] remember it and to work for it (a variant reading [for bi-khālisatin dhikrā’l-dār] has the genitive construction [bi-khālisati dhikrā’l-dār], making this [dhikrā al-dār, ‘remembrance of the Abode’] the explicative thereof).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We purified them with a pure thought) We selected them, (remembrance of the Home (of the Hereafter) for the remembrance of Allah and the remembrance of the Hereafter.
